### Bear, Brown

_A hulking, swaying brute with claws as long as a finger._

**LV** 5, **AL** N
**AC** 13, **HP** 25, **MV** near (climb)
**ATK** 2 claw +4 (1d8)

**Crush:** Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.
